synopsis.text:
Brilliant chaos unfolds at Amagi Brilliant Park, where Kanie struggles to maintain order amidst a workplace mishap, forcing him to reshuffle his staff and take on new roles. Meanwhile, Moffle embarks on a unique PR training mission with Eiko, Biino, and Shiina, promising an unexpected adventure.

In another episode, the park is abuzz with excitement as it's Seiya's birthday! Isuzu and Moffle plan a surprise party, but the park's daily chaos threatens to ruin their plans. As roles are switched and mishaps ensue, Isuzu struggles to deliver her gift to Seiya. Will the party be a success, and will Isuzu finally give her present to Seiya?

At Amagi Brilliant Park, every employee has a perfect role, but sometimes, they must step out of their comfort zones and take on new challenges. The goofball employees soon discover that these new roles are more difficult than they expected.  Join the Amagi Brilliant Park team as they navigate through these hilarious and heartwarming situations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
